        return $this;
    }

    public function set_seek_position($position) {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_read_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_write_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function streaming_read_callback($curl_handle, $file_handle, $length) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_read_callback, $curl_handle, $file_handle, $length);
        }
        if ($this->read_stream && !feof($this->read_stream)) {
            $data = fread($this->read_stream, $length);
            $this->read_stream_read += strlen($data);
            return $data;
        }
        return '';
    }

    public function streaming_write_callback($curl_handle, $data) {
        $written = 0;
        if ($this->write_stream) {
            $written = fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);
        }
        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl_handle, $data);
        }
        return $written;
    }

    public function prep_request() {
        $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
        $options = [
            CURLOPT_URL => $this->request_url,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $this->method,
            CURLOPT_HEADER => true,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => ($this->write_stream ? false : true),
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array_map(function($k, $v) { return "$k: $v"; }, array_keys($this->request_headers), $this->request_headers),
            CURLOPT_USERAGENT => $this->useragent,
            CURLOPT_VERBOSE => $this->debug_mode,
        ];

        if ($this->username !== null && $this->password !== null) {
            $options[CURLOPT_USERPWD] = "{$this->username}:{$this->password}";
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            $options[CURLOPT_PROXY] = $this->proxy['host'];
            if (isset($this->proxy['port'])) {
                $options[CURLOPT_PROXYPORT] = $this->proxy['port'];
            }
            if (isset($this->proxy['type'])) {
                $options[CURLOPT_PROXYTYPE] = $this->proxy['type'];
            }
            if (isset($this->proxy['username']) && isset($this->proxy['password'])) {
                $options[CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD] = "{$this->proxy['username']}:{$this->proxy['password']}";
            }
        }

        if ($this->read_stream) {
            $options[CURLOPT_UPLOAD] = true;
            $options[CURLOPT_READFUNCTION] = [$this, 'streaming_read_callback'];
            if ($this->read_stream_size !== null) {
                $options[CURLOPT_INFILESIZE_LARGE] = $this->read_stream_size;
            }
        } else if ($this->request_body) {
            $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = $this->request_body;
        }

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            $options[CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION] = [$this, 'streaming_write_callback'];
        }

        if ($this->seek_position !== null) {
            $options[CURLOPT_SEEKFUNCTION] = function($curl_handle, $offset, $whence) {
                return fseek($this->read_stream, $offset, $whence);
            };
        }

        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $option => $value) {
                $options[$option] = $value;
            }
        }

        curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $options);
        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle, $response) {
        if (!$curl_handle) return false;

        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $this->response_code = $this->response_info['http_code'];

        if ($response !== false) {
            $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
            $this->response_headers = explode("\r\n", substr($response, 0, $header_size));
            $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        }

        return $response;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = true) {
        $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        $this->response = $response;
        $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, $response);
        return $parse ? $this->response_body : $this->response;
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null) {
        if ($header === null) {
            return $this->response_headers;
        }
        foreach ($this->response_headers as $h) {
            if (stripos($h, $header . ':') === 0) {
                return trim(substr($h, strlen($header) + 1));
            }
        }
        return null;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}

    private $password = null;
    private $curlopts = [];
    private $debug_mode = false;
    private $request_class = 'RequestCore';
    private $response_class = 'ResponseCore';
    private $useragent = 'RequestCore PHP/' . PHP_VERSION;
    private $read_file = null;
    private $read_stream = null;
    private $read_stream_size = null;
    private $read_stream_read = 0;
    private $write_file = null;
    private $write_stream = null;
    private $seek_position = null;
    private $cacert_location;
    private $ssl_verification = true;
    private $registered_streaming_read_callback = null;
    private $registered_streaming_write_callback = null;
    private $timeout = 30;
    private $connect_timeout = 10;

    public function __construct($url = null, $proxy = null, $helpers = null) {
        if ($url !== null) {
            $this->request_url = $url;
        }
        if ($proxy !== null) {
            $parsed_proxy = parse_url($proxy);
            $this->proxy = [
                'host' => $parsed_proxy['host'] ?? '',
                'port' => $parsed_proxy['port'] ?? 8080,
                'user' => $parsed_proxy['user'] ?? null,
                'pass' => $parsed_proxy['pass'] ?? null,
            ];
        }
        if (is_array($helpers)) {
            foreach ($helpers as $key => $value) {
                if (property_exists($this, $key)) {
                    $this->$key = $value;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public function __destruct() {
        if (is_resource($this->read_stream)) {
            fclose($this->read_stream);
        }
        if (is_resource($this->write_stream)) {
            fclose($this->write_stream);
        }
        if (is_resource($this->curl_handle)) {
            curl_close($this->curl_handle);
        }
    }

    public function set_credentials($user, $pass) {
        $this->username = $user;
        $this->password = $pass;
        return $this;
    }

    public function add_header($key, $value) {
        $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function remove_header($key) {
        unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_method($method) {
        $valid_methods = ['GET', 'POST', 'PUT', 'DELETE', 'HEAD'];
        if (in_array(strtoupper($method), $valid_methods)) {
            $this->method = strtoupper($method);
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_useragent($ua) {
        $this->useragent = $ua;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_body($body) {
        $this->request_body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_request_url($url) {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_curlopts($curlopts) {
        $this->curlopts = $curlopts;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream_size($size) {
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream($resource, $size = null) {
        $this->read_stream = $resource;
        if ($size !== null) {
            $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_file($location) {
        $this->read_file = $location;
        $this->read_stream = fopen($location, 'rb');
        if ($this->read_stream && $this->read_stream_size === null) {
            $stat = fstat($this->read_stream);
            $this->read_stream_size = $stat['size'];
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_stream($resource) {
        $this->write_stream = $resource;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_file($location) {
        $this->write_file = $location;
        $this->write_stream = fopen($location, 'wb');
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_proxy($proxy) {
        $parsed_proxy = parse_url($proxy);
        $this->proxy = [
            'host' => $parsed_proxy['host'] ?? '',
            'port' => $parsed_proxy['port'] ?? 8080,
            'user' => $parsed_proxy['user'] ?? null,
            'pass' => $parsed_proxy['pass'] ?? null,
        ];
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_seek_position($position) {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_read_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_write_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function streaming_read_callback($curl_handle, $file_handle, $length) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_read_callback, $curl_handle, $file_handle, $length);
        }
        if (!$this->read_stream) {
            return '';
        }
        $remaining = $this->read_stream_size - $this->read_stream_read;
        $bytes_to_read = min($length, $remaining);
        $data = fread($this->read_stream, $bytes_to_read);
        $this->read_stream_read += strlen($data);
        return $data;
    }

    public function streaming_write_callback($curl_handle, $data) {
        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            return call_user_func($this->registered_streaming_write_callback, $curl_handle, $data);
        }
        if ($this->write_stream) {
            return fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);
        }
        $this->response_body .= $data;
        return strlen($data);
    }

    public function prep_request() {
        $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
        $options = [
            CURLOPT_URL => $this->request_url,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => false,
            CURLOPT_HEADER => false,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $this->method,
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [],
            CURLOPT_USERAGENT => $this->useragent,
            CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => $this->timeout,
            CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT => $this->connect_timeout,
            CURLOPT_VERBOSE => $this->debug_mode,
        ];

        foreach ($this->request_headers as $key => $value) {
            $options[CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER][] = "$key: $value";
        }

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            $options[CURLOPT_USERPWD] = $this->username . ':' . $this->password;
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            $options[CURLOPT_PROXY] = $this->proxy['host'] . ':' . $this->proxy['port'];
            if ($this->proxy['user'] && $this->proxy['pass']) {
                $options[CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD] = $this->proxy['user'] . ':' . $this->proxy['pass'];
            }
        }

        if ($this->ssl_verification) {
            $options[CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER] = true;
            if ($this->cacert_location) {
                $options[CURLOPT_CAINFO] = $this->cacert_location;
            }
        } else {
            $options[CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER] = false;
        }

        if ($this->read_stream) {
            if ($this->seek_position !== null) {
                fseek($this->read_stream, $this->seek_position);
            }
            $options[CURLOPT_READFUNCTION] = [$this, 'streaming_read_callback'];
            $options[CURLOPT_UPLOAD] = true;
            $options[CURLOPT_INFILESIZE] = $this->read_stream_size;
        }

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            $options[CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION] = [$this, 'streaming_write_callback'];
        }

        if ($this->method === 'POST' || $this->method === 'PUT') {
            $options[CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS] = $this->request_body;
        }

        foreach ($this->curlopts as $option => $value) {
            $options[$option] = $value;
        }

        foreach ($options as $option => $value) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, $option, $value);
        }

        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null) {
        if (!$curl_handle) {
            $curl_handle = $this->curl_handle;
        }
        if ($response !== null) {
            $this->response = $response;
        }
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $this->response_code = $this->response_info['http_code'];
        $header_size = $this->response_info['header_size'];
        $raw_headers = substr($this->response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_headers = $this->parse_headers($raw_headers);
        $this->response_body = substr($this->response, $header_size);
        return $this->response_info;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = false) {
        if (!$this->curl_handle) {
            $this->prep_request();
        }
        $this->response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        $this->process_response();
        if ($parse) {
            return new $this->response_class($this);
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function send_multi_request(array $handles, array $opt = null) {
        $multi_handle = curl_multi_init();
        foreach ($handles as $handle) {
            curl_multi_add_handle($multi_handle, $handle);
        }
        $running = null;
        do {
            curl_multi_exec($multi_handle, $running);
            curl_multi_select($multi_handle);
        } while ($running > 0);
        $responses = [];
        foreach ($handles as $handle) {
            $responses[] = curl_multi_getcontent($handle);
            curl_multi_remove_handle($multi_handle, $handle);
        }
        curl_multi_close($multi_handle);
        return $responses;
    }

    private function parse_headers($raw_headers) {
        $headers = [];
        $lines = explode("\r\n", $raw_headers);
        foreach ($lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        return $headers;
    }
}

Task Description: Create a PHP class that utilizes the Guzzle HTTP client to fetch content from a URL and load it into a DOM object.

Class Description: The `Dom` class provides functionality to load HTML content from a URL using the Guzzle HTTP client. It allows for optional customization of the HTTP client and request objects, and handles the response to extract the content for DOM processing.

Methods:

Method1: `loadFromUrl(string $url, ?Options $options = null, ?ClientInterface $client = null, ?RequestInterface $request = null)` -> `Dom` - Loads HTML content from the specified URL using the provided or default Guzzle HTTP client and request objects. The content is then loaded into a DOM object. Throws various exceptions for error handling.

Input Parameters:
- `$url`: string - The URL from which to fetch the HTML content.
- `$options`: ?Options - Optional configuration options for the DOM loading process.
- `$client`: ?ClientInterface - Optional Guzzle HTTP client instance. If not provided, a default client is created.
- `$request`: ?RequestInterface - Optional Guzzle HTTP request instance. If not provided, a default GET request is created.

Output:
- Returns an instance of `Dom` with the loaded HTML content.

Task Description: Create a PHP class for handling HTTP requests using cURL with support for various HTTP methods, streaming, authentication, and proxy configuration.

Class Description: BCS_RequestCore is a comprehensive HTTP client class that provides a flexible interface for making HTTP requests using PHP's cURL extension. It supports all major HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD), handles authentication, proxy configuration, streaming uploads/downloads, and provides detailed response information.

Attributes:

request_url: [string] - The URL to send the request to
request_headers: [array] - Associative array of request headers
request_body: [string] - The request body content
response: [string] - The complete response from the server
response_headers: [array] - Parsed response headers
response_body: [string] - The response body content
response_code: [int] - HTTP response status code
response_info: [array] - Additional response information from cURL
curl_handle: [resource] - The cURL handle resource
method: [string] - HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD)
proxy: [array|null] - Proxy configuration details
username: [string|null] - Username for authentication
password: [string|null] - Password for authentication
curlopts: [array|null] - Additional cURL options

request_class: [string] - Class name for request handling
response_class: [string] - Class name for response handling
useragent: [string] - User agent string
read_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming upload
read_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for reading
read_stream_size: [int|null] - Size of the read stream
read_stream_read: [int] - Bytes read from the stream
write_file: [string|null] - File path for streaming download
write_stream: [resource|null] - Stream resource for writing
seek_position: [int|null] - Position to seek in the read stream
registered_streaming_read_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming read
registered_streaming_write_callback: [callable|null] - Callback for streaming write

Methods:

remove_header([string] $key) -> [self] - Removes a request header

        if ($this->write_stream) {
            fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);
        } elseif ($this->write_file) {

    public function prep_request() {
        $ch = curl_init();
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->request_url);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, true);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $this->method);
        curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, array_map(fn($k, $v) => "$k: $v", array_keys($this->request_headers), $this->request_headers));

        if ($this->request_body) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "{$this->username}:{$this->password}");

        if ($this->proxy) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->proxy['host'] ?? '');
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXYPORT, $this->proxy['port'] ?? '');
            if (!empty($this->proxy['username']) && !empty($this->proxy['password'])) {
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD, "{$this->proxy['username']}:{$this->proxy['password']}");

        if ($this->read_stream || $this->read_file) {
            $in_stream = $this->read_stream ?: fopen($this->read_file, 'rb');
            if ($this->seek_position !== null) fseek($in_stream, $this->seek_position);
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_INFILE, $in_stream);
            if ($this->read_stream_size !== null) {
                curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
            }
        }

        if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_read_callback);
        }

        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_write_callback);
        } else {
            curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
        }

        if ($this->debug_mode) curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, true);
        if ($this->useragent) curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $this->useragent);

        if (is_array($this->curlopts)) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $opt => $val) {
                curl_setopt($ch, $opt, $val);
            }
        }

        $this->curl_handle = $ch;
        return $ch;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, $response = null) {
        if (!$curl_handle) $curl_handle = $this->curl_handle;
        if (!$response) $response = $this->response;

        $info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $this->response_info = $info;
        $this->response_code = $info['http_code'];

        $header_size = $info['header_size'];
        $headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $body = substr($response, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = $body;
        $this->response_headers = [];

        foreach (explode("\r\n", $headers) as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $line, 2);
                $this->response_headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }

        curl_close($curl_handle);
        return $this;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = true) {
        $ch = $this->prep_request();
        $this->response = curl_exec($ch);
        return $this->process_response($ch, $this->response);

    public function isBaeEnv() {

    public function get_response_header($header = null) {
        if ($header === null) return $this->response_headers;
        return $this->response_headers[$header] ?? null;

        return $this->response_body;

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;
